headline: Waters Stock Is Falling on Deal to Combine With Becton Dickinson Unit
summary: Life sciences firm Waters will take on $4 billion in debt, and issue 39.2% of its shares to Becton Dickinson shareholders.

headline: Are Options Traders Betting on a Big Move in Thermo Fisher Stock?
summary: Investors need to pay close attention to TMO stock based on the movements in the options market lately.

raw.headline: Are Options Traders Betting on a Big Move in Thermo Fisher Stock?

headline: Thermo Fisher Scientific Introduces the Oncomine Comprehensive Assay Plus on the Ion Torrent Genexus System to Help Advance the Future of Precision Medicine
summary: CARLSBAD, Calif., July 14, 2025--Today, Thermo Fisher Scientific announced that the Oncomine™ Comprehensive Assay Plus* is now available on the Ion Torrent™ Genexus™ System* helping accelerate precision oncology research. The Oncomine Comprehensive Assay Plus detects a broad range of genomic alterations in 517 genes and will now be able to deliver comprehensive genomic profiling (CGP) results as soon as the next day, enabled by Ion Torrent technology and easy, automated workflows.
